# Assimp Library

This directory contains the [Open Asset Import Library (Assimp)](https://github.com/assimp/assimp).

## Version Information

- **Version**: 5.4.3 (Binary Release)
- **Source**: https://github.com/assimp/assimp/releases/tag/v5.4.3
- **Date**: 2024

## Contents

- `include/assimp/` - Header files
- `lib/Debug/` - Debug build libraries (assimp-vc143-mtd.lib)
- `lib/Release/` - Release build libraries (assimp-vc143-mt.lib)

## Usage

This library is used by `MeshLoaderAssimp` for loading OBJ, FBX, and other 3D model formats.

## License

BSD License - See the header files for full license text.

## Local Modifications

None. This is an unmodified binary release.
